topicSummary: Benign paroxysmal positional vertigo (BPPV) is a disorder of the inner ear characterized by repeated episodes of positional vertigo

topicHtmlObjects.htmlHeader: Benign paroxysmal positional vertigo: Summary

latestChanges.title: Reviewed
latestChanges.body: A literature search was conducted in August 2017 to identify evidence-based guidelines, UK policy, systematic reviews, and key randomized controlled trials published since the last revision of this topic. No major changes to the recommendations have been made.
